data.name: AMA Office Hours on Embracing empathy in our communication and collaboration during a crisis
data.summary:
This AMA session would address -

How to put fellow humans at the centre, even as we try to figure out the post-COVID uncertainties.

As we talk more about BCPs, do we still place "growth at any cost" as the focus.

During such crisis, do we get back to the basics of communication and collaboration?

Tech-led vs Tech-enabled -- how has this changed during this pandemic

How the many elements have come together, and have presented new dimensions for us humans -- psychology, philosophy, technology, and leadership
